title: Wall Street Breakfast July 11: Stocks Down On Trump Threat Of More China Tariffs

description: Our top stories today: Stocks down on Trump Threat of more China tariffs; China slams threat as “completely unacceptable”; and Twenty-First Century Fox to buy Britain’s Sky. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
